dublin_core.dcvalue: Telemedicine for pathology this is pathology in which the specimen is digitally transmitted and examined by a pathologist at a distance In another words telemedicine for pathology or simply telepathology is a branch of telemedicine and pathology that consists in the exchange of pathology images through telecommunication with the purposes of diagnosis consultation research and or education The use of telepathology is of great importance in management of patients since it allows fast diagnosis and inter consultations among specialist pathologists located in every part of the world
Studies in health technology and informatics
